pages.text: Nipponomaria was an ancient Permian marine snail that was first discovered in Japan. They had a spiralled shell and were quite large. They would have preyed on micro organisms on the ocean floor.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Punch
